characterCounter.title: Character Counter
characterCounter.description: Count characters, words, and lines in your text

darkMode.title: ① Dark Mode Toggle
darkMode.description: Switch between dark mode and light mode. Choose the display mode that's most comfortable for your eyes.

charCount.title: ② Character Count
charCount.description: Counts the number of characters in the input box.

inputBox.title: ③ Input Box
inputBox.description: Enter or paste the text you want to analyze in this box.

lineCount.title: ④ Line Count
lineCount.description: Counts the number of line breaks in your text.

wordCount.title: ⑤ Word Count
wordCount.description: Counts words in space-separated text, perfect for English and other space-delimited languages.

byteCount.title: ⑥ Byte Count (Multibyte Support)
byteCount.description: Counts the number of bytes, with full support for multibyte characters like Japanese text.

copyButton.title: ⑦ Copy Button
copyButton.description: Copy the current text in the input box with one click. Perfect for quickly transferring edited text.

stringSearch.title: ⑧ String Search & Occurrence Counter
stringSearch.description: Count how many times a specific string appears in your text. Useful for SEO keyword density analysis.

step1.title: 1. Enter Text
step1.description:
Copy & paste text into the input area or type and edit directly.
Note: Simply typing will instantly count the number of characters, lines, words (English only), and bytes (multibyte compatible).
step1.text: Copy & paste text into the input area or type and edit directly.

step2.title: 2. Real-time Results
step2.description: As you type, various counts are displayed in real-time, allowing you to check them instantly.
step2.text: As you type, various counts are displayed in real-time, allowing you to check them instantly.

step3.title: 3. Utilize Results
step3.description:
Results can be copied using the copy button.
Use the displayed numbers as a reference for social media posts, advertising copy, academic papers, and more.
step3.text: Results can be copied using the copy button. Use the displayed numbers as a reference for social media posts, advertising copy, academic papers, and more.

usecase.title: Use Cases
usecase.subtitle: How People Use Our Character Counter
usecase.description: Our character counter tool is utilized in various scenarios. Here are some specific examples!

efficientArticle.title: Efficient Article Creation
efficientArticle.description: When creating blog posts or newsletters, you can monitor character count in real-time to ensure you stay within specified limits. This enables article creation that meets deadlines and posting guidelines.

structure.title: Structure Optimization
structure.description: Used for balancing paragraph lengths for readability and SEO purposes. Helps create appropriate heading and body text lengths while maintaining awareness of overall content volume.

social.title: 2. Social Media and Ad Copy Creation

limits.title: Character Limit Compliance
limits.description: Social media platforms like Twitter and Facebook have character limits for posts. You can verify if your text meets these requirements before posting, avoiding the risk of important messages being cut off.

adCopy.title: Effective Ad Copy Creation
adCopy.description: Ad copy and promotional messages require simple yet impactful expressions. Using the character counter makes it easier to adjust messages for maximum impact within limited character spaces.

content.title: Maintaining Optimal Content Volume
content.description: The character counter helps adjust article volume and keyword placement for SEO purposes. Maintaining recommended character counts helps improve overall article quality for search engines.

structure.title: Structured Content Creation
structure.description: To aim for high search result rankings, it's important to manage heading and body text lengths appropriately and create readable structures. Using the app to track section lengths helps achieve effective internal structure.

brand.title: Brand Message Optimization
brand.description: In advertising campaigns and promotional activities, catchphrase length is crucial. The character counter allows precise adjustments to create impactful copy even with limited characters.

documents.title: Document and Presentation Preparation
documents.description: When creating marketing materials or presentations that need concise information, the character counter helps eliminate excess information and create documents with clear key points.

usecase.conclusion: Through these use cases, our character counter tool contributes to improving efficiency in various fields including writing, social media posting, SEO optimization, and marketing. By adapting usage to each scenario, you can achieve more effective information communication.

1.name: Mr. Tanaka, Writer
1.quote: This character counting tool is simple yet powerful and has dramatically improved my work efficiency. I especially appreciate that it can count words in English text.

2.name: Mr. Kawaguchi, Social Media Manager
2.quote: The real-time counting feature is incredibly convenient. It's invaluable for checking character counts while revising article content and verifying text for social media posts with character limits!

3.name: Mr. Yamamoto, Web Marketer
3.quote: The feature to see how many times a specified string appears is very useful, and I use it regularly! I use it to check the frequency of SEO keywords on competitor pages.

q1.question: Q1. What is a character counting app?
q1.answer: A: A character counting app is a tool that instantly calculates the number of characters in entered text and displays accurate results. This prevents manual counting errors and enables efficient text creation and editing.

q2.question: Q2. What scenarios can it be used in?
q2.answer: Main usage scenarios include: Writing/blog posting, SNS posting, SEO optimization, and Ad copy creation.

q3.question: Q3. How are full-width and half-width characters counted?
q3.answer: A: Both full-width and half-width characters are properly recognized and counted accurately. Special symbols and line breaks are also counted.

q4.question: Q4. Is it compatible with multiple languages?
q4.answer: A: Yes, the app supports multiple languages including Japanese and English, with proper handling of characters and symbols for each language.

q6.question: Q6. Is registration required?
q6.answer: A: No, our basic features are available without registration. However, some premium features may require a user account.

q7.question: Q7. Is my text data secure?
q7.answer: A: Yes, all text processing is done locally in your browser. We do not store or transmit your text data to any servers.

q8.question: Q8. Do you collect any user data?
q8.answer: A: We only collect anonymous usage statistics to improve our service. No personal data or text content is collected.

meta.title: FAQ - Character Counter Tool | Frequently Asked Questions
meta.description: Find answers to frequently asked questions about our character counter tool. Learn about features, usage, and troubleshooting tips.
meta.keywords: character counter faq, text counter questions, word count help, character count tutorial, text analysis guide

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: This privacy policy explains how Boring Inc. ('we', 'us', or 'our') collects, uses, and shares information when you use our online character counter ('Service'). By accessing or using the Service, you agree to the terms of this privacy policy.

text.title: 1.1 User-Provided Text
text.description:
Text entered or pasted into the character counter is not stored or recorded. The text is temporarily processed on the server (or in the browser, depending on implementation) to count characters, then immediately discarded.

The entered text is not used for any other purpose.

log.title: 1.2 Log Data
log.intro: Like most online services, we may automatically collect the following information when you access our Service:
log.purpose: This information ('Log Data') is used for service maintenance, improvement, and troubleshooting.

cookies.title: 1.3 Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.description:
We may use cookies or similar tracking technologies to improve user experience and analyze site traffic.

Cookies do not provide personally identifiable information. You can disable cookies in your browser settings, but this may affect some Service functionality.

usage.title: 2. How We Use Information
usage.intro: Collected information is used for the following purposes:

purposes.1: Service Provision & Maintenance – e.g., character counting and ensuring smooth functionality
purposes.2: Improvement & Customization – Understanding usage patterns and improving site interface and features
purposes.3: Analytics – Tracking service performance and usage trends

usage.note: We never sell, rent, or lease your data (including text) to third parties.

sharing.title: 3. Information Sharing
sharing.intro: We never share entered text with third parties. However, Log Data may be shared in the following cases:

cases.1: Service Providers: Trusted third parties who assist with website hosting, analytics, and security
cases.2: Legal or Regulatory Reasons: When required by law, court order, or to protect our rights and property

retention.title: 4. Data Retention
retention.description:
We do not retain text entered into the character counter.

Log Data may be stored on secure servers or cloud services for the period necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy.

children.title: 5. Children's Privacy
children.description: Our character counter is not intended for individuals under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you discover information that may have been collected from a child, please contact us and we will delete it.

security.title: 6. Security Measures
security.description: We implement reasonable measures to protect collected information from unauthorized access, alteration, and destruction. However, no data transmission or storage method is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

changes.title: 7. Privacy Policy Changes
changes.description: This privacy policy may be updated periodically. When changes occur, we will update the 'Effective Date' on this page. Your continued use of the Service after changes indicates acceptance of the revised policy.

contact.title: 8. Contact Us
contact.description:
If you have questions or concerns about this privacy policy or our practices, please contact us at:

Email: support@boring-tool.com

oneClick.description: This tool features a simple interface where new words appear instantly with just a button click. The intuitive operation requires no special knowledge or setup, making it readily available whenever inspiration strikes.

database.title: Rich Word Database
database.description: Our database covers numerous genres and categories. From everyday words to technical terms, and even unexpected words that spark creative thinking, we offer a wide range of options. This diversity makes the tool valuable for writers, designers, marketers, and professionals across various fields.

design.title: Intuitive and User-Friendly Design
design.description: The simple yet sophisticated design allows users to focus immediately on their intended operations. With responsive design optimized for smartphones and tablets, you can comfortably use the tool from any device.

scenes.title: Diverse Applications
scenes.writer: Writer's Ideation: When stuck while writing, use it as a keyword source for new inspiration. It's helpful in various situations, from blog titles and catchphrases to story concept development.
scenes.designer: Designer's Creative Thinking: Use it as a starting point to find fresh perspectives and new themes in logo design and project concept development.
scenes.brainstorming: Brainstorming: In team ideation meetings, randomly generated words can spark discussions and promote unexpected idea combinations and innovations.

writer.name: Blog Writer A
writer.quote: I use it whenever I need fresh ideas. The simple operation produces diverse words, often leading to unexpected insights.

designer.name: Graphic Designer B
designer.quote: Using this tool in the initial design phase helps me gain perspectives I might otherwise miss. It's brought fresh energy to my projects!

algorithm.title: Unique Algorithm
algorithm.description: The tool incorporates a random number generation algorithm that displays different words with each button press. This algorithm efficiently generates diverse word combinations to help users gain new inspiration.

database.title: Extensive Word Database
database.description: The database includes words from literature, daily conversation, business terminology, and creative keywords across various fields. Regular updates add new words based on current trends and user needs, continuously expanding the tool's capabilities.

performance.title: Performance and Security
performance.description: The design is lightweight and fast, optimized for instant word generation. User input data and usage patterns are never stored, ensuring safe usage. Privacy and security considerations support reliable service operation.

free.question: Is this tool free to use?
free.answer: Yes, it's basically free to use. All features are available without restrictions, though we plan to announce future database expansions and premium features separately.

words.question: What kinds of words are generated?
words.answer: We randomly generate words from a wide range of categories, from everyday terms to technical vocabulary and unique words that promote creative thinking. Diverse words are provided each time to meet user needs.

commercial.question: Can I use it for commercial purposes?
commercial.answer: Yes, commercial use is permitted. However, you must comply with our terms of use. Please check the terms of use page for specific conditions and restrictions.

mobile.question: Can I use it from mobile devices?
mobile.answer: Yes, we've adopted responsive design, so you can comfortably use it from smartphones and tablets. Word generation works smoothly on any device.

conclusion.title: Conclusion
conclusion.description: This Random Word Generator is the perfect tool for drawing out creative ideas and supporting daily ideation and brainstorming. With its simple operation, rich word database, and advanced algorithm, it powerfully supports your creativity. We invite all creators seeking new perspectives and ideas to try this tool and capture inspiration for their next steps.

q1.question: How are the names generated?
q1.answer: Names are generated using a combination of common name patterns and creative elements to ensure uniqueness and usability.

q2.question: Can I use these names commercially?
q2.answer: Yes, all generated names are free to use for any purpose, including commercial use.

q3.question: How many names can I generate?
q3.answer: You can generate up to 100 names at once, and there's no limit to how many times you can use the generator.

description.intro: A free password generator tool that instantly creates secure and strong passwords. Customize length and character types to create unique passwords for each account.

easyOperation.description: Complex passwords are generated instantly with one click and ready to use. Anyone can easily achieve high security.

customization.description: Fine-tune settings like length, symbols, uppercase/lowercase letters, and numbers to create passwords that suit your needs.

corporate.title: Corporate System Security
corporate.description: Ideal for generating passwords for employee accounts and internal systems.

algorithm.title: Cryptographic Random Number Generation Algorithm
algorithm.description: Uses the latest cryptographic technology to generate unpredictable passwords. Designed with security as the top priority.

privacy.title: Privacy Protection Design

commercial.answer: Yes, it can be used by both businesses and individuals in accordance with the terms of service.
